programme.title: Origin of Monogamy
programme.desc: To cure Sun-Ae's misandry, mental counselor Sung-hae intentionally lets her junior Sun-Ae to meet a man.

programme.title: Go Back
programme.desc: Ji-won, a motivated new police officer, is strangely bothered after meeting O-sun, a social worker. On a hot summer day, a kidnapper sends a message saying, ‘If you want to save the kidnapped child, donate money to the welfare center.’ The incident becomes a national concern as the media report it. Somehow, Ji-won doubts the link between the case and O-sun.

programme.title: 4:44 : Time Of Fear
programme.desc: Missing persons. Eerie sounds. Shadows at night. Bukchon Apartment hides more than secrets.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: For catching a gangster, a cop, Jae-in, poses as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: Four ex-taekwondo friends reunite to fight gangs and save their hometown from a dangerous deal.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il, who is a five-month pregnant ahead of her marriage, goes to her hometown to find her biological father, whom she has never seen since the age of seven. After returning to Seoul, To-il’s mom, stepdad and biological father join forces to find the groom-to-be who has been missing on the day of the meeting with bride-groom families.

programme.title: Moonlit Winter
programme.desc: Sae-bom finds a mysterious love letter sent to her mom, Yun-hee. This letter makes her wonder about Yun-hee.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: A bed soaked in blood, a missing body and charges of murder. No one can be trusted until the trial is over!

programme.title: Don't Click
programme.desc: After watching a video of an evil necromantic ritual, Jung-mi begins to experience a series of strange events.

programme.title: One Day
programme.desc: Kang-soo, an insurance investigator, has lost all the hope and purpose of living after his wife died. One day, the company gives him the case of Mi-so, a girl who’s fallen into a coma from a car accident. At the hospital he goes to investigate the case, he meets a girl who claims that she is Mi-so, who in reality can’t walk or talk. Kang-soo eventually comes to accept that for some reason only he can see the spirit of Mi-so. And Mi-so asks Kang-soo to help her biggest wish come true before she has to leave this world for good.

programme.title: OK! MADAM
programme.desc: Mi-Young runs a shop at a traditional market, where she makes and sells twisted bread sticks. Her husband Seok-Hwan works as a computer repairman. One day, Seok-Hwan wins a free trip to Hawaii. Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan will go on their first international trip together. When Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan get on the airplane to Hawaii, things don't go as expected. Terrorists, including Cheol-Seung, who chase after a secret agent, get on the same airplane. The passengers soon become hostages. Suddenly, Mi-Young and Seok-Hwan begin to rescue the passengers.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Hiding his murderous past, Joo-hyeop faces a deadly choice when his son's friend learns his dark secret.

programme.title: A Case Of Bachelor Abduction
programme.desc: Three friends investigate a mysterious woman who abducted and shamed two of them, using various tactics.
